article_title: Two Porter men accused of killing three animals during May arson
article_text:

og.description: Michael Lee Smith, 56, and Charles Wayne Smith, 40, are accused of being involved in an arson at a residence on the 22500 block of South 365th East Avenue on May 20, Wagoner County Maj. Gary Handley said in a release.
